Dialogue.Page: About damn time you showed up, cadet! Abandoning your duty as a Solar Ranger? The invaders will be launching an attack any minute now!

DialogueOption.Text: Cadet? You must be mistaken, I'm not--

Dialogue.Page: What was that, cadet? Are you questioning your superior officer?
Good! Now then, let's get you briefed on the situation.

DialogueOption.Text: What do you need me to do?

Dialogue.Page: You hit your head out there, cadet?
The Solar Rangers are the last bastion of freedom and justice in the outer wilds!
Using our superior technology and firepower, we defend settlers and other peaceful folk from the dangers lurking in deep space.
That's right! An invasion! The nefarious Eggmund Empire is preparing to conquer this solar system!
See that unsightly planetoid beneath us? That's one of their dastardly Egg Star battlestations!
Using fractal hyperdimensional spacetime folding, they've packed an entire armada of attack ships inside, just waiting to strike.
To keep the community of the outer wilds safe, we must repel these invaders!
Sweet mother of stars, they're here!
Now get to your ship, cadet! We've just outfitted it with the latest armaments! Go take down those eggheads!
Good! Now get to your ship, cadet! That's an order!
